Package com.accele.gage.tile

Class TileMapMeta

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.accele.gage.tile.TileMapMeta
  • public class TileMapMeta
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper class for specifying information about a TileMap. GAGE comes with a built-in external tile map reader to easily parse large or complicated tile maps. Refer to TILE_MAP_LOADER for more details.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    William Garland
    See Also:
    TILE_MAP_LOADER

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TileMapMeta​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​Texture> textures, int[] tiles, int rowSize, float tileWidth, float tileHeight, int visibleTilesX, int visibleTilesY)
      Constructs a TileMapMeta with the specified texture map, tiles, row size, tile dimensions, and number of visible tiles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getRowSize()
      Returns the number of tiles per row in the map.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​Texture> getTextures()
      Returns the Map of tile indices and Texture instances used to relay which texture goes with which tile.
      float getTileHeight()
      Returns the height of an individual tile.
      int[] getTiles()
      Returns the tile layout of the map.
      float getTileWidth()
      Returns the width of an individual tile.
      int getVisibleTilesX()
      Returns the number of tiles visible on the screen at any one time in the x-direction for this TileMap.
      int getVisibleTilesY()
      Returns the number of tiles visible on the screen at any one time in the y-direction for this TileMap.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TileMapMeta

        public TileMapMeta​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​Texture> textures,
                   int[] tiles,
                   int rowSize,
                   float tileWidth,
                   float tileHeight,
                   int visibleTilesX,
                   int visibleTilesY)
        Constructs a TileMapMeta with the specified texture map, tiles, row size, tile dimensions, and number of visible tiles.
        Parameters:
        textures - the mapping between tile indices and Texture instances
        tiles - the tile layout of the map
        rowSize - the number of tiles per row in the map
        tileWidth - the width of an individual tile
        tileHeight - the height of an individual tile
        visibleTilesX - the number of tiles visible on the screen at any one time in the x-direction
        visibleTilesY - the number of tiles visible on the screen at any one time in the y-direction
